item.title: Addressing hot takes about scientific research done on music
item.description: I’m always interested in ‘hot takes’ on micro-blogging platforms that take issues with scientific research done on music.

item.title: BlueSky for Music Science 101
item.description: This post is a brief description and concise argument concerning BlueSky and the #musicscience community.

item.title: #musicscience on BlueSky
item.description: During my lunch breaks this week, I figured out how to set up a #musicscience feed on Bluesky.
